See you on September 10th,

Regents exams are going to be cancelled as well. Official word and details are expected tomorrow. We do not have any more details then that - but our kids still need to continue working as we will likely have a local final exam in all of those classes originally tied to a Regents.

All students have been given access to, or have been able to have academic packets made available, as a part of our Phase II of learning while on closure. If your student says they haven't gotten any work please contact your student's school. It is available and students are expected to be working! Phase II work has been pushed out over the last few days!

Stay strong and healthy everyone!

#FortheHeights

The movie is for parents and guardians only. The 56-minute film and virtual reality experience explores anxiety, it causes, effects and what we can do about it. The filmmakers' goal is to have a global conversation and raise awareness around anxiety. ANGST features candid interviews with kids and young adults who suffer, or have suffered, from anxiety and what they've learned about it. The film includes discussions with mental health experts about the causes of anxiety and its sociological effects, as well as help, resources, and tools. For more information please visit https://angstmovie.com/
